name: Frost-Afflicted
description: The Frost-Afflicted is a medium-sized humanoid characterized by its frost-rimed skin, reflecting its connection to a cold element. It wears leather armor and exhibits a wild demeanor.
memorable: It is immune to cold damage and has abilities that enhance its cold attacks, making it a dangerous opponent in combat.
goals: To survive in cold environments and retaliate against threats with cold attacks.
relations: Other cold-aligned creatures, possible elemental entities.
strengths: Immune to cold damage and conditions like exhaustion or petrified.
weaknesses: Average charisma and limited defensive capabilities make it vulnerable to certain tactics.
attacks: Uses Frigid Punch for melee combat and Frost Bolt for ranged cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Burning Cold allows its cold damage to bypass creature resistances.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 13, allowing it to detect hidden threats.
skills: Proficient in perception with a +3 modifier, enhancing its ability to notice hidden creatures.
additional_information: Requires only half the food and drink typical for its size due to Icy Nature.
Can retaliate with Frigid Flare when hit in melee, causing area cold damage.
spellcasting: Can cast spells that deal cold damage, enhancing its combat effectiveness.
